field_contributor_source.label: Choose the contributor you want to ask

field_message_question.placeholder: Indicate your question in relation with the webpage you are now visiting.

common.title: Oops!
common.message: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

notices.dont_appear: I've tested a bunch, and I don't see any posts

notice.feedback_dislike: Thanks for the feedback, this post won't show anymore

subscriptions.title: $t(menu.subscriptions)
subscriptions.no_followed_sources:
You're not following any contributor right now.
To get the most out of DisMoi, subscribe to some contributors!

about.description: When you visit a webpage, DisMoi lets you read messages from your contributors and post messages yourself.

submitted.confirm: Your contribution will be posted within 24h, a confirmation will be sent to you via email.

confirmation.message: It will be transmitted right away to the relevant contributor(s). You'll receive their response via email.

services.label: Choose my contributors
services.first_message_none: To post and receive messages, please finalize your setup.
services.first_message_exist: There is a contribution on this page. To read it, please finalize your configuration.
